entry.tran: 石油商；石油大王；石油工人
entry.def: An oilman is a man who owns an oil company or who works in the oil business.

example.ex: Five oilmen were injured when a gas explosion shook a North Sea oil rig yesterday.
example.tran: 北海的一处石油钻塔昨天发生了瓦斯爆炸，5名石油工人受伤。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who owns or operates oil wells
2. a worker who produces or sells petroleum
